attributes.additional_details: Due to rescent roiting and vandalism in our country, the very fact that the amount of youths involved in this anarchy would give me thought to the very fact that these individuals are unemployed and unruly, they need to be employed, if not in the communities then enrol them into National Service, get them trained, to learn respect and to turn them into useful members of society, whilst ensuring they are not able to roam the streets like ferral animals, then they can only leave national service if they are to go into work or they stay on to continue service.
